name: Introduction to Chemistry
description: A general introduction to Chemistry, this course covers the fundamental principles and theories in the field.

name: Organic Chemistry
description: This course introduces the principles of organic chemistry and its applications to real-world problems.

name: Inorganic Chemistry
description: This course covers the principles of inorganic chemistry, including the nature and properties of elements and molecules.

name: Physical Chemistry
description: This course covers the principles of physical chemistry, including thermodynamics, quantum mechanics, and statistical mechanics.

name: Theoretical Chemistry
description: This course covers the principles of theoretical chemistry, including quantum mechanics, computational chemistry, and chemical dynamics.
